name: Noodle's Revolt
description:
Made for Weekly Game Jam 156, theme is noodle.

Seeing all of your fellow noodles getting transported by noodle boxes to some noodle-loving humans, your fate is clear. That's when you start your revolt. 

The first step is to eliminate every noodle boxes that try to transport you. How do you do that ? EAT 'EM!!!

Controls :

  • Move - W, A, S, D
  • Shoot noodle arms - Arrow keys

Let me know if you would like to see the game updated. I have already thought of some new enemies and power-ups feature. Though I can only update it when I got some spare time. 

Credits

All game's components are made by myself except the fonts. 

Here's the guy who made the font : codeman38 & Daniel Linssen

Thanks and enjoy your noodle
